start_boss.text: Oh what's that? That's so tiny though!
On my way to do some big insecure crushing!

retreat.text: Ooh there's a lot of them! Maybe we'll see them again!

engaged.text: Another one added to my list.
Ooh, they want some let's give them some.

need_help.text: Oh I don't want to die!

running.text: I need to make a quick break first.

hull_90.text: What a small beating that was.

hull_50.text: Part of the fun is endurance!

hull_30.text: Oh my, the hull is lava!
I'll be fine, it's not like I'll die or anything.

overload.text: Oooh and my fun is ruined!
Oh you didn't want to do that...
